channel.title: Crowdfunding Collection #190, including every tabletop rpg project started between 02/01 and 02/06
channel.description: I present to you the new Crowdfunding Collection #190, including every tabletop rpg project started between 02/01 and 02/06. With the ZineQuest 2022 in full swing this week had about 124 projects going live. Alot of them via itch.io fundings, who I found thanks to the ZIMO website. So far I haven’t seen another way to browse itch.io fundings. If you know about projects that I missed or those that are started within the next week, just contact me. item.title: Crowdfunding Collection #190, including every tabletop rpg project started between 02/01 and 02/06
item.dc:creator: @Teylen
item.description:
@Teylen wrote:

I present to you the new Crowdfunding Collection #190, including every tabletop rpg project started between 02/01 and 02/06.

With the ZineQuest 2022 in full swing this week had about 124 projects going live.
Alot of them via itch.io fundings, who I found thanks to the ZIMO website. So far I haven’t seen another way to browse itch.io fundings. If you know about projects that I missed or those that are started within the next week, just contact me.

English Crowdfundings

5 Roleplaying Games
2 SciFi Roleplaying Games
6 Zine Roleplaying Games
3 Zine Apocalyptic Roleplaying Games
2 Fantasy Roleplaying Games
2 Zine Goblin Roleplaying Games
2 Zine Cat Roleplaying Games
4 Zine SciFi Roleplaying Games
5 Zine Urban Fantasy Roleplaying Games
8 Solo Roleplaying Games
2 Solo Exploration Roleplaying Games
5 Settings
3 D&D 5E Settings
2 Mothership Settings
6 Sourcebooks
6 D&D 5E Sourcebooks
4 OSE/OSR Sourcebooks
2 Troika Sourcebooks
7 System-Specific Sourcebooks
4 Adventures
2 Cthulhu Dark Adventures
5 D&D 5E Adventures
2 Liminal Adventures
5 Mothership Adventures
2 Mothership Solo Adventures
5 Mörk Borg Adventures
4 System-Neutral Adventures
6 Dice & Spinner Projects
1 Coin Project
1 Deck of Cards
4 Map Projects
4 Various RPG Projects

French Crowdfundings

1 Sourcebook
1 Map Project

Italian Crowdfundings

1 Roleplaying Game

Article: https://teylen.blog/2022/02/06/crowdfunding-collection-190/
